doc.title: Miss Chinatown, U.S.A.
doc.plot: "Miss Chinatown, U.S.A." is the story of a young woman who competes in one of America's oldest ethnic beauty pageants. As Katie travels from her native Seattle to the bustling streets of San Francisco's Chinatown, we gain unique insight into an individual who is wrestling with issues of identity as she matures into adulthood.
